'''Oleg Kozitsyn''' is a Technical Lead of the UI team at [[Mojang Studios]].

He leads a team of engineers in {{w|C++|C++}} to search for a new interface structure for Minecraft.<ref>https://se.linkedin.com/in/kozitsyn</ref> In 2017, he was a Senior Developer and was working on the Bedrock Edition of Minecraft since the version [[Bedrock Edition 1.2.9|1.2.9]], for integration of the interface layout mechanism in Minecraft.
